Game.Name: Snow Brothers (Europe)
Game.plot: Snow Brothers is an Action game, developed by Sol and published by Capcom,which was released in 1991.Cheat: CodesCheat: Alternate EndingComplete the game without using any continues to see an alternate endingCheat: Time ModeTo play a hidden, timed version of the game, there are ways to activate the requisite mode, depending on the release of the game you are playing.
Game.Notes: Nick and Tom are two Princes living the dream with two beautiful princesses. When suddenly the evil King Scorch freezes Prince Nick and Tom and kidnaps the Princesses. Now Nick and Tom find themselves with abilities dealing with snow and ice. These two Snow Brothers will need to hunt down the evil King Scorch and rescue the princesses.
